item.title: ProMods 2.70 RusMap 2.50 Connector v1.50 ETS2
item.description:
ProMods 2.70 RusMap 2.50 Connector v1.50 ETS2

This fix has been created for the combination of ProMods 2.70 and RusMap 2.50 only and should have high priority in the Mod manager.

Load order in the Mod manager:
PM270_RM250_Connector
RusMap Map Package
RusMap Model Package
ProMods Definition package
ProMods Map Package
ProMods Media Package
ProMods Models Package 3
ProMods Models Package 2
ProMods Models Package 1
ProMods Assets Package
RusMap Def Package



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Kenworth T604 v1.2.0.0 ATS
item.description:
Kenworth T604 v1.2.0.0 ATS

Kenworth T604
– Kenworth Dealer
– 4 Cabins
– 6X2 & 8X6 Chassis
– A lot of Tunings
– Engines – Caterpiller 3406E, Caterpillar C15 & C15 Stock, Cummins N14, Cummins ISX (Gen 2), Cummins Signature (Gen 2)
– Eaton Fuller Manual or Automated Manual Transmissions
– Caterpillar 3406E & Caterpillar C15 & C15 Stock Sounds By Kriechbaum
– Cummins N14, Cummins ISX, & Cummins Signature Sounds By Kriechbaum
– Detroit Diesel Series 60 Sounds By Kriechbaum

item.title: International 9800 Sound fix v1.50 ATS
item.description:
International 9800 Sound fix v1.50 ATS

This mod is the replacement for the previous International 9800 Sound Mod.
This mod is a sound fix for the International 9800, where you have your own truck mod sounds, converted to Fmod. It brings its engines with their respective sounds and effects from the original mod. Functional only for versions 1.39 and 1.40 beta.

ATTENTION:
Use the International 9800 truck mod, from odd_fellow, Harven, Lucasi and Pauly; and place the sound mod as follows:
– International 9800 sound fix v x.x
– International 9800 by ood_fellow, Harven, Lucasi & Pauly

If you know how to modify the mod, please do not share it with anyone, otherwise please do not do it to avoid some mistake or crash.
Do not upload the mod to other links, keep the original link (Sharemods). The original files are the property of their respective authors, their server was only responsible for updating them.
Instructions to enable the mod:
Download the file at the original link, use a compression / decompression program such as WinRar or 7Zip, extract the folder and copy or move it to your game Mod folder, open the game and enable it in Mods Manager, in the order described above.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Trailers Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.8.2 ETS2
item.description:
Trailers Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.8.2 ETS2

Pack adds in traffic 1379 trailers with 5091 skins of real companies.
All standalone.
Only quality lowpoly models – no FPS drop.
AI cables simulation compatible.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.50.x
Models and skins by: SCS Software, Giants Software, Pereira, Millsyb, Aspectxx, Mkkl, Vaarduar, SkGe, Speedy143, Steini, Slash, Krokus, News, Zeros, Kast, Mrkalash62, RommiTZ, zincan, Rudi, bik_san, Vlakyt, LadenSwallow, Wobler, Adam Steel, Alik, Belyashik2K and others

Version 12.8.2 – optimization with HashFS V2 (for extract mod use scs packer by SCS Software)
